language.entry: Recent excavations have revealed a sealed casket in the depths of the labyrinth. Citizens are advised to avoid the mausoleum until further notice...
... the Slayer's vigil is unending. We are safe. We are safe. We are safe. We are safe. We are...

With a dizzying array of weapons and relentless fury, the Slayer strikes back at the twisted creatures of the Hamlet. He fully embraces their flesh-twisting properties to strengthen his attacks, and every strike he makes against the creatures from below feeds the hungry beast possessing his weapon, until it unleashes a devastating final attack. But be wary; the creature powering his weapon is fickle, and has been known to exact its toll from the Slayer as well as his enemies.

Powered by creatures from beyond this world, the Slayer's eldritch plate and demon-bound rifle have merged with what remains of the human wielding them, growing in strength together and feeding off bloody carnage.

The Slayer's reasons for coming to the Hamlet are known only to himself, as his laconic attitude leaves little room for conversation. Between battles, the Slayer's indomintable will seems bent on containing and directing the hungry creatures that make up his arms; few beings exist on this earth that could withstand their combined fury.
Recent excavations have revealed a sealed casket in the depths of the labyrinth. Citizens are advised to avoid the mausoleum until further notice...

“只有他一个人对抗那该死的……”
最近的挖掘发现迷宫深处有一个密封的棺材。建议市民在另有通知前避开陵墓……
……屠魔者的守夜是无休止的。我们很安全。我们很安全。我们很安全。我们很安全。我们很……
屠魔者用令人眼花缭乱的武器和无情的愤怒回击哈姆雷特扭曲的生物。他完全拥入那扭曲的血肉来增强他的攻击，他对这些生物的每一次攻击都会喂饱占据武器的饥饿野兽，直到它发动毁灭性的终结攻击。但你要小心，那驱使枪的野兽，是变化无常的，众所周知，他是从屠魔者和他的仇敌那里夺去的生命所改造的。
在来自这个世界以外的生物的驱动下，屠魔者的邪术板甲和被恶魔束缚的来复枪与挥舞着它们的人类遗骸融合在一起，一同增长力量，以血腥的屠杀为食。
屠魔者来到哈姆雷特的原因只有他自己知道，因为他简练的态度几乎没有交谈的余地。在战斗中，屠魔者的意志似乎更执着于控制和指挥组成的他自己的手臂的生物；在这个世界上没有多少生物能够抵挡它们的结合在一起的狂怒。
Recent excavations have revealed a sealed casket in the depths of the labyrinth. Citizens are advised to avoid the mausoleum until further notice...
